# Spells (Alphabetical List - S)
## Sa-Se
**Sacramental Seal <sup>F</sup>:** Seal a creature away inside the spell's focus

**[[Sacred Bond (Spell)|Sacred Bond]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Cast touch healing spells from a distance.

**[[Sacred Guardian (Spell)|Sacred Guardian]]****:** You know *[[Status (Spell)|status]]* of subject and can *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]* or *scry* without error.

**[[Sacred Haven (Spell)|Sacred Haven]]****:** Creatures gain +2 AC, retain Dex bonus, and you can lay on hands at range.

**[[Sacred Item (Spell)|Sacred Item]]****:** Target object deals 1d4/caster level (max. 10d4) points of positive energy damage to the next undead, evil outsider, 

     or evil shapechanger that touches it; undead must also save or flee for 1d4 minutes.

**Sacred Nimbus:** Holy energy damages evil creatures that attack you and protects you from good attacks.

**[[Sacred Space (Spell)|Sacred Space]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** Sanctify an area with holy power.

**Sacrifice:** Make a sacrifice to aid conjuring and commanding a planar creature.

**[[Sacrificial Oath (Spell)|Sacrificial Oath]]****:** Take damage for an ally for many rounds.

**[[Sacrificial Skill (Spell)|Sacrificial Skill]]****:** Caster gains +5 bonus on [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (religion) checks made during sacrifice.

**[[Saddle Surge (Spell)|Saddle Surge]]****:** Bonus damage for moving on mount.

**[[Sadism (Spell)|Sadism]]****:** For every 10 hp damage caster deals, he gains +1 on attacks, saves, and checks.

**Sadomasochism <sup>R</sup>:** Take more damage from opponents, but force them to become demoralized.

**[[Safe Clearing (Spell)|Safe Clearing]]****:** As *[[Sanctuary (Spell)|sanctuary]]*, but protects an area and lasts 1 hour/level.

**[[Safety (Spell)|Safety]]****:** Touched creature knows shortest route to safety.

**[[Saltray (Spell)|Saltray]]****:** Ray deals 1d6 damage/2 levels and stuns.

**Salvage:** Pull together the remains of a shipwreck and reform it into a working vessel.

**[[Sanctify Armor (Spell)|Sanctify Armor]]****:** +1 AC/four levels (max +5).

**Sanctify Corpse:** Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead creature.

**[[Sanctify the Wicked (Spell)|Sanctify the Wicked]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Traps evil creature in a diamond for one year, then releases it as a sanctified creature.

**Sanctify Weapons:** Allow all weapons in the area to bypass a specific type of fiendish DR.

**[[Sanctuary (Spell)|Sanctuary]]** **<sup>Y</sup>:** Opponents can’t attack you, and you can’t attack.

**[[Sanctuary, Mass (Spell)|Sanctuary, Mass]]****:** One creature/level can’t be attacked, and can’t attack.

**Sand Table:** Create a model of the surrounding land and the creatures nearby.

**Sand Whirlwind, Greater:** Create a large whirlwind of sand, blinding and hampering the ability to speak of those within.

**[[Sandblast, Greater (Spell)|Sandblast, Greater]]****:** Cone of sand and wind deals 6d8 points of damage and blows away opponents.

**[[Sandblast, Lesser (Spell)|Sandblast, Lesser]]****:** You fire hot sand that deals 1d6 nonlethal damage, stuns enemies.

**[[Sandform (Spell)|Sandform]]****:** You become an oozelike being of sand.

**[[Sandstorm (Spell)|Sandstorm]]****:** Creates a controlled duststorm.

**[[Sap Strength (Spell)|Sap Strength]]****:** Subject becomes [[Exhausted|exhausted]].

**[[Sapphire Screen of Shielding (Spell)|Sapphire Screen of Shielding]]****:** Moving shield of force grants +4 bonus to AC against ranged attacks 

     and DR 10/magic against all other attacks.

**[[Sarcophagus of Stone (Spell)|Sarcophagus of Stone]]****:** Sarcophagus entombs subject.

**Sarzari Shadow Memory <sup>M</sup>:** Learn information to aid you in assassinating a creature.

**[[Savage Maw (Spell)|Savage Maw]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** Transform your mouth into a ferocious maw, gain a bestial roar to demoralize your enemies.

**[[Saving Finale (Spell)|Saving Finale]]****:** Subject rerolls failed saving throw.

**Sawtooth Terrain:** Cause giant mantis limbs to sprout from the ground, damaging and cripping creatures.

**[[Scalding Mud (Spell)|Scalding Mud]]****:** Transmute rock or earth into boiling muck.

**[[Scalding Touch (Spell)|Scalding Touch]]****:** Touch deals 13d6 fire damage and dazes victim; usable a number of times equal to level.

**[[Scale Weakening (Spell)|Scale Weakening]]****:** Subject’s natural armor weakens.

**[[Scales of the Lizard (Spell)|Scales of the Lizard]]****:** Grants +2 or higher enhancement bonus to natural armor.

**[[Scales of the Sealord (Spell)|Scales of the Sealord]]****:** Add 10 ft. to swim speed or gain swim speed of 15 ft.; add natural armor bonus +1/3 levels.

**[[Scare (Spell)|Scare]]****:** Frightens creature of less than 6 HD.

**Scarify:** Convert some lethal damage to nonlethal damage, causing massive scarring.

**[[Scattergloom (Spell)|Scattergloom]]****:** You create mobile areas of magical darkness.

**[[Scattering Trap (Spell)|Scattering Trap]]****:** Imbue one 5-ft. square/2 levels with teleport trap.

**[[Scent (Spell)|Scent]]****:** Grants the [[S3.1R-S - Universal Monster Rules R-S (Bestiary 6 Apx)|scent]] special ability.

**[[Scent Trail (Spell)|Scent Trail]]****:** Leave trail for allies to follow.

**Scentless:** Negates [[S3.1R-S - Universal Monster Rules R-S (Bestiary 6 Apx)|scent]] ability.

**[[Scentless, Greater (Spell)|Scentless, Greater]]****:** As *scentless,* but with a longer duration.

**[[Scholar's Touch (Spell)|Scholar’s Touch]]****:** Read books in seconds.

**[[Scimitar of Sand (Spell)|Scimitar of Sand]]****:** Sand sword deals 1d6 damage +1/2 levels and renders target dehydrated.

**[[Scintillating Pattern (Spell)|Scintillating Pattern]]****:** Twisting colors confuse, stun, or render [[Unconscious|unconscious]].

**[[Scintillating Scales (Spell)|Scintillating Scales]]****:** Your natural armor bonus turns into a deflection bonus.

**[[Scintillating Sphere (Spell)|Scintillating Sphere]]****:** 20-ft.-radius spread deals 1d6 electricity/level.

**[[Scorch (Spell)|Scorch]]****:** Jet of flame deals 1d8/2 levels (max 5d8).

**[[Scorching Ash Form (Spell)|Scorching Ash Form]]** **<sup>RY</sup>:** Change someone into a gaseous cloud of hot ash and smoke, dealing fire damage to those they move through.

**[[Scorching Blood (Spell)|Scorching Blood]]****:** Deal 2d6 fire damage per round; second casting sickens target.

**[[Scorching Ray (Spell)|Scorching Ray]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 4d6 fire damage, + 1 ray/four levels (max 3).

**[[Scorpion Tail (Spell)|Scorpion Tail]]****:** Target grows a scorpion tail that strikes for 2d6 damage (plus Str modifier) and possibly stuns the target.

**[[Scourge (Spell)|Scourge]]****:** Inflicts a disease that must be magically cured, one subject/level.

**[[Scourge of Force (Spell)|Scourge of Force]]****:** Tendrils of force lash foes for 1d8 +1/2 levels damage each.

**Scourge of the Horsemen:** Blast an area with soul-rending energy, dealing 1d4 negative levels and 1d6 acid/level.

**[[Scramble Portal (Spell)|Scramble Portal]]****:** You randomize the destination of a magic portal.

**[[Screech (Spell)|Screech]]****:** Foes provoke attacks of opportunity.

**[[Screen (Spell)|Screen]]****:** Illusion hides area from vision and scrying.

**[[Scribe's Binding (Spell)|Scribe's Binding]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Turn a creature into a biography of their life.

**Scripted Hallucination:** As *complex hallucination*, but without concentration.

**[[Scrivener's Chant (Spell)|Scrivener's Chant]]:** Imbue a quill to rapidly transcribe words from one page to another.

**[[Scry Location (Spell)|Scry Location]]****:** Spy on a distant location.

**[[Scry Trap (Spell)|Scry Trap]]****:** Scry attempts against target deal 1d6/level damage and blind scrying creature.

**[[Scrying (Spell)|Scrying]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Spies on subject from a distance.

**[[Scrying, Greater (Spell)|Scrying, Greater]]****:** As *[[Scrying (Spell)|scrying]]*, but faster and longer.

**[[Scrying Cage (Spell)|Scrying Cage]]****:** Modifies the functioning of all divination (scrying) spells and spell-like abilities into, out of, and within its area of effect, 

     and it bars the functioning of all divination (scrying) spells into, out of, and within its area of effect.

**[[Sculpt Sound (Spell)|Sculpt Sound]]****:** Creates new sounds or changes existing ones into new sounds.

**Sculpted Cape:** Enchanted cape stiffens and can bear weight

**[[Sea Eyes (Spell)|Sea Eyes]]****:** Alters the subject’s eyes to permit easy underwater vision.

**[[Sea Legs (Spell)|Sea Legs]]****:** Target creature can maneuver easily while on a ship.

**[[Seal Portal (Spell)|Seal Portal]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Seal an interplanar portal or gate.

**[[Sealed Sending (Spell)|Sealed Sending]]****:** Create a scroll bearing a message that magically appears anywhere you have viewed at least once.

**[[Seamantle (Spell)|Seamantle]]****:** Sheathes you in protective water.

**[[Searing Exposure (Spell)|Searing Exposure]]****:** Target suffers hours of wasteland exposure in a moment.

**[[Searing Light (Spell)|Searing Light]]****:** Ray deals 1d8/two levels damage (more against undead).

**[[Secluded Grimoire (Spell)|Secluded Grimoire]]****:** Send a spellbook into a random but safe location on the [[Ethereal Plane]], where it remains indefinitely.

**[[Secret Chest (Spell)|Secret Chest]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Hides expensive chest on [[Ethereal Plane]]; you retrieve it at will.

**[[Secret Page (Spell)|Secret Page]]****:** Changes one page to hide its real content.

**Secret Sign:** Invisibly inscribe a small mark or message on a creature or obejct.

**[[Secret Signs (Spell)|Secret Signs]]****:** Communicate a simple nonverbal message to one intelligent creature.

**Secret Speech <sup>R</sup>:** Send secret messages to others within normal speech.

**[[Secret Vault (Spell)|Secret Vault]]****:** As *[[Secret Chest (Spell)|secret chest]]**,* except it affects a small structure, vault, or oversized chest.

**[[Secret Weapon (Spell)|Secret Weapon]]****:** Makes hidden weapon almost impossible to detect.

**[[Secret Workshop (Spell)|Secret Workshop]]****:** As *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]* except that any number of creatures or objects in range are affected.

**[[Secure Corpse (Spell)|Secure Corpse]]****:** Traps corpse inside holy symbol.

**[[Secure Shelter (Spell)|Secure Shelter]]****:** Creates sturdy cottage.

**See Alignment:** Pick an alignment; in your sight, creatures and items with that alignment emit a ghostly radiance.

**[[See Invisibility (Spell)|See Invisibility]]****:** Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

**[[Seed of Life (Spell)|Seed of Life]]****:** Subject gains [[S3.1D-F - Universal Monster Rules D-F (Bestiary 6 Apx)|fast healing]] 2 and can invoke a burst of healing.

**[[Seed of Undeath (Spell)|Seed of Undeath]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Subject that dies before spell expires rises as a zombie under your command.

**[[Seed of Undeath, Greater (Spell)|Seed of Undeath, Greater]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Seed of Undeath (Spell)|seed of undeath]]*, but affects an area.

**Seeds of Influence:** Weaken a creature to your divinations and enchantments.

**[[Seek Eternal Rest (Spell)|Seek Eternal Rest]]****:** Turn undead as cleric of your level.

**Seek Shelter:** Weak creatures are compelled to seek shelter.

**[[Seek Thoughts (Spell)|Seek Thoughts]]****:** Detects creatures in the area thinking about something.

**[[Seeking Ray (Spell)|Seeking Ray]]****:** Ray deals 4d6 electricity damage, ignores concealment and cover; you gain +4 on attacks with rays against the subject.

**[[Seeker's Chant (Spell)|Seeker's Chant]]****:** Gives you a +2 bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks, but a -2 penalty on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks.

**[[Seeming (Spell)|Seeming]]****:** Changes appearance of one person per two levels.

**Seer's Bane <sup>R</sup>:** As *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]*, but damages those who cast divination spells on the warded creature/item.

**[[Seething Eyebane (Spell)|Seething Eyebane]]****:** Subject is [[Blinded|blinded]] and all within 5 ft. take 1d6 damage.

**[[Semblance of Life (Spell)|Semblance of Life]]****:** Undead take 3d6 damage per round; intelligent undead also [[Dazed|dazed]] 1 round.

**[[Sending (Spell)|Sending]]****:** Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

**[[Sense Heretic (Spell)|Sense Heretic]]****:** Glow reveals when evil creature is near.

**[[Sense of the Dragon (Spell)|Sense of the Dragon]]****:** Nonvisual senses out to 30 ft. that pinpoints creatures.

**[[Sense of the Dragon, Greater (Spell)|Sense of the Dragon, Greater]]****:** As *[[Sense of the Dragon (Spell)|sense of the dragon]]**,* but senses out to 90 ft. that pinpoints creatures with greater accuracy.

**[[Sense Spirit Magic (Spell)|Sense Spirit Magic]]****:** Gain bonuses on identifying and resisting spells associated with your spirits.

**[[Sense Weakness (Spell)|Sense Weakness]]****:** Automatically confirm one critical hit.

**[[Sensory Deprivation, Lesser (Spell)|Sensory Deprivation, Lesser]]****:** All of subject’s senses are blocked.

**[[Sentinel's Watch (Spell)|Sentinel's Watch]]****:** Subject is warded deception, allowing him to pierce falsehoods of all forms more easily.

**[[Sentry Skull (Spell)|Sentry Skull]]** **<sup>MR</sup>:** Create a grisly sentinel from the severed head of a humanoid or monstrous humanoid.

**[[Sepia Snake Sigil (Spell)|Sepia Snake Sigil]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creates a snake-shaped text symbol that immobilizes reader.

**[[Sequester (Spell)|Sequester]]****:** Subject is invisible to sight and scrying; renders creature comatose.

**[[Serene Visage (Spell)|Serene Visage]]****:** Gain insight bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] checks equal to half your level.

**Serenity:** Peaceful feelings harm those attempting violence.

**[[Serpent Arrow (Spell)|Serpent Arrow]]****:** Transforms missiles into Tiny vipers.

**[[Serpents of Theggeron (Spell)|Serpents of Theggeron]]****:** Caster’s arms become serpents with 10 ft. reach, +10 attack, and 1d8 damage plus poison.

**[[Servant Horde (Spell)|Servant Horde]]****:** Create 1 *[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|unseen servant]]* per level (max +15).

**Sessile Spirit:** Cause a spirit inhabiting a creature or an object to go dormant.

**Sever from the Source:** You prevent the target form casting any arcane magic or using any supernatural abilities.

**[[Sever Legacy (Spell)|Sever Legacy]]****:** Target permanently loses all legacy abilities.

## Sf-Sj
**[[Shades (Spell)|Shades]]****:** As *[[Shadow Conjuration (Spell)|shadow conjuration]]*, but up to 8th level and 80% real.

**[[Shadow Arrow (Spell)|Shadow Arrow]]****:** Masterwork arrow or bolt deals 1d6 points of Strength damage.

**[[Shadow Barbs (Spell)|Shadow Barbs]]****:** Creates a shadowy vicious spiked chain that radiates darkness around you.

**[[Shadow Binding (Spell)|Shadow Binding]]****:** Ribbonlike shadows entangle creatures in 10-ft.-radius burst.

**Shadow Bomb Admixture:** Empowers bombs you throw to cover the target with a shadowy substance 

     that grants it concealment and limits its vision.

**[[Shadow Cache (Spell)|Shadow Cache]]****:** You open a small portal to the [[Shadow, Plane of|Plane of Shadow]] through which you can put an item for later retrieval.

**[[Shadow Canopy (Spell)|Shadow Canopy]]****:** You create a field of shadow whose outer surface is impenetrable to normal vision and darkvision, 

     granting 100% concealment to creatures and objects within.

**[[Shadow Conjuration (Spell)|Shadow Conjuration]]****:** Mimics conjuration below 4th level, but only 20% real.

**[[Shadow Conjuration, Greater (Spell)|Shadow Conjuration, Greater]]****:** As *[[Shadow Conjuration (Spell)|shadow conjuration]]*, but up to 6th level and 60% real.

**[[Shadow Double (Spell)|Shadow Double]]****:** Shadowy figure attacks enemies.

**Shadow Dragon Aspect:** Shroud yourself in a shadowy illusion of a dragon.

**[[Shadow Evocation (Spell)|Shadow Evocation]]****:** Mimics evocation of lower than 5th level, but only 20% real.

**[[Shadow Evocation, Greater (Spell)|Shadow Evocation, Greater]]****:** As *[[Shadow Evocation (Spell)|shadow evocation]]*, but up to 7th level and 60% real.

**Shadow Fangs:** Your melee attacks issue forth from any shadow or area of darkness which is within the spell’s radius.

**[[Shadow Fangs, Greater (Spell)|Shadow Fangs, Greater]]****:** As *shadow fangs,* but with greater range and you threaten within the area of effect.

**Shadow Guardians:** Create group of shadowy warriors.

**Shadow Invasion**: Create an area of darkness that strengthens shadow spells and attracts [[Kyton (Bestiary PF1)|kytons]].

**Shadow Jaunt:** Teleport, leaving an illusion of yourself in the space you left.

**[[Shadow Landscape (Spell)|Shadow Landscape]]****:** Makes natural terrain more dangerous, creates guardians that you command.

**[[Shadow Mask (Spell)|Shadow Mask]]****:** Grants +4 on saves against light spells, protection from gaze attacks.

**[[Shadow of the Dark Queen]]****:** Imbues object with *[[Deeper Darkness (Spell)|deeper darkness]]* spell; evil dragon and dragonblood creatures unaffected.

**[[Shadow Phase (Spell)|Shadow Phase]]****:** Subject becomes partially incorporeal.

**[[Shadow Portal (Spell)|Shadow Portal]]****:** Opens a portal to the [[Shadow, Plane of|Plane of Shadow]].

**[[Shadow Projection (Spell)|Shadow Projection]]****:** Temporarily become a shadow.

**[[Shadow Radiance (Spell)|Shadow Radiance]]**: Area filled with intense light that grows brighter.

**[[Shadow Shape (midgardpf)|Shadow Shape]]****:** Gain +4 on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] and [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] checks, and concealment; 

     you can move through obstacles if you have ranks in [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]].

**[[Shadow Shroud (Spell)|Shadow Shroud]]****:** Negate light blindness/vulnerability; +5 bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks.

**[[Shadow Snare (Spell)|Shadow Snare]]****:** Bind a greater shadow to an object as its guardian.

**[[Shadow Space (Spell)|Shadow Space]]****:** You create an extradimensional space within your own shadow.

**[[Shadow Spray (Spell)|Shadow Spray]]****:** Deals 4 points of Str damage and dazes.

**Shadow Step:** Teleport from one shadow to another.

**[[Shadow Tentacle (Spell)|Shadow Tentacle]]****:** As *[[Shadow Tentacle, Lesser (Spell)|lesser shadow tentacle]]*, except the tentacle is larger and stronger.

**[[Shadow Tentacle, Lesser (Spell)|Shadow Tentacle, Lesser]]****:** Animate a nearby shadow into a rope-like tentacle which can entangle foes.

**Shadow Trap:** Pin someone’s target, causing them to become stuck.

**[[Shadow Walk (Spell)|Shadow Walk]]****:** Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

**[[Shadow Well (Spell)|Shadow Well]]****:** Subject enters gloomy pocket plane and emerges [[Frightened|frightened]].

**Shadowbard:** Shadowy duplicate starts a bardic performance.

**[[Shadowblast (Spell)|Shadowblast]]****:** Blast of light stuns and damages natives to the [[Shadow, Plane of|Plane of Shadow]].

**Shadowfade:** Become invisibile to creatures using darkvision.

**Shadowform:** Replace the target’s body with mystic shadow material, causing them to take less damage from attacks.

**[[Shadowy Grappler (Spell)|Shadowy Grappler]]****:** Illusory force grapples subject.

**[[Shadowy Haven (Spell)|Shadowy Haven]]** **<sup>R</sup>:** Create a hidden room to conceal you on the edge of the [[Shadow, Plane of|Plane of Shadow]].

**[[Shaking Hand (Spell)|Shaking Hand]]****:** As *[[Interposing Hand (Spell)|interposing hand]]*, except the hand can also grapple the magic hands created by other spells.

**[[Shambler (Spell)|Shambler]]****:** Creates 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.

**[[Shape Metal (Spell)|Shape Metal]]****:** As *[[Stone Shape (Spell)|stone shape]]*, that you affect metal instead of stone.

**[[Shape of the Hellspawned Stalker (Spell)|Shape of the Hellspawned Stalker]]****:** You take the form of a hell hound.

**[[Shapechange (Spell)|Shapechange]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Transforms you into certain creatures, and you can change forms once per round.

**Shapechanger's Gift:** Temporarily change a target into an animal, humanoid, or monstrous humanoid.

**[[Shard Blessing Aura (Spell)|Shard Blessing Aura]]****:** Create an aura of shimmering blue-white; this aura functions like a *[[Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser (Spell)|lesser globe of invulnerability]]**.*

**Shard of Chaos:** Harm and possibly slow lawful creatures.

**[[Shard Storm (Spell)|Shard Storm]]****:** Blast deals 3d6 damage to creatures in area.

**[[Share Animal's Mind (Spell)|Share Animal's Mind]]****:** Take control of the target animal's body.

**[[Share Husk (Spell)|Share Husk]]****:** See and hear through the senses of a touched animal.

**[[Share Language (Spell)|Share Language]]****:** Subject understands chosen language.

**Share Language, Communal:** As *[[Share Language (Spell)|share language]]*, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

**Share Memory:** Share one memory with the target.

**[[Share Senses (Spell)|Share Senses]]****:** Perceive the world around your familiar.

**Share Shape:** As *[[Beast Shape II (Spell)|beast shape II]]*, but you may only assume the form of an animal type identical to your companion or familiar.

**[[Share Talents (Spell)|Share Talents]]****:** Subjects gain +2 bonus on skill checks.

**[[Shared Blessing (Spell)|Shared Blessing]]****:** Subject gains +1 bonus to AC and +2 bonus to saves while within 10 feet of you.

**[[Shared Healing (Spell)|Shared Healing]]****:** Subject creature can cure up to twice your caster level of its own hit points.

**[[Shared Wrath (Spell)|Shared Wrath]]****:** As *[[Wrath (Spell)|wrath]]*, but affects multiple creatures.

**[[Sharing the Ancient Lore (Spell)|Sharing the Ancient Lore]]****:** Transfer a single memory from yourself to a target.

**[[Shark's Form (Spell)|Shark’s Form]]****:** You take the form of a Medium shark.

**[[Sharptooth (Spell)|Sharptooth]]****:** One of your natural weapons deals damage as if you were one size larger.

**[[Shatter (Spell)|Shatter]]****:** Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.

**[[Shatterfloor (Spell)|Shatterfloor]]****:** Deals 1d4 sonic/level plus damages floor surface.

**[[Sheltered Vitality (Spell)|Sheltered Vitality]]****:** Subject gains immunity to fatigue, exhaustion, ability damage, and ability drain.

**[[Sherem Transformation (Spell)|Sherem Transformation]]****:** Allows unborn child to select special sorcerer or monk feat.

**[[Shield (Spell)|Shield]]****:** Invisible disc gives +4 to AC, blocks magic missiles.

**[[Shield Against the Balanced (Spell)|Shield Against the Balanced]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** You emit an invisible force to repel neutral-aligned outsiders.

**[[Shield Against the Contrary (Spell)|Shield Against the Contrary]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** You emit an invisible force to repel chaotic-aligned outsiders.

**[[Shield Against the Dark (Spell)|Shield Against the Dark]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** You emit an invisible force to repel evil-aligned outsiders.

**[[Shield Against the Focused (Spell)|Shield Against the Focused]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** You emit an invisible force to repel lawful-aligned outsiders.

**Shield Against the Light <sup>F</sup>:** You emit an invisible force to repel good-aligned outsiders.

**[[Shield Companion (Spell)|Shield Companion]]****:** As *[[Shield Other (Spell)|shield other]]*, but affecting your companion creature.

**[[Shield of Faith (Spell)|Shield of Faith]]** **<sup>Y</sup>:** Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.

**[[Shield of Faith, Mass (Spell)|Shield of Faith, Mass]]****:** Allies gain +3 or higher AC bonus.

**[[Shield of Fortification (Spell)|Shield of Fortification]]****:** Target gains a 25% chance to treat critical hits and sneak attacks as normal hits.

**[[Shield of Fortification, Greater (Spell)|Shield of Fortification, Greater]]****:** Target gains a 50% chance to treat critical hits and sneak attacks as normal hits.

**[[Shield of Law (Spell)|Shield of Law]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against chaotic spells.

**[[Shield of Light (Spell)|Shield of Light]]****:** Grants +2 armor bonus/three caster levels and +1 enhancement bonus/three caster levels to AC; undead cannot attack.

**[[Shield of the Archons (Spell)|Shield of the Archons]]****:** Protective shield dissipates targeted magical attacks 

     and grants +4 bonus on saving throws against magical areas and effects.

**Shield of the Dawnflower <sup>RY</sup>:** Create a protective shield of sunlight.

**Shield of the Dawnflower, Greater <sup>R</sup>:** Create a shield of sunlight.

**[[Shield of Warding (Spell)|Shield of Warding]]****:** Shield grants +1 bonus on AC and Reflex saves/5 levels (max +5).

**[[Shield Other (Spell)|Shield Other]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** You take half of subject’s damage.

**Shield Speech:** Speak freely to one creature within 10 feet without being overheard.

**Shield Speech, Greater:** Communicate freely with a group of nearby people without anyone else being able to overhear.

**Shield the Banner:** Protect your tribe's banner with a sanctuary-like effect.

**[[Shieldbearer (Spell)|Shieldbearer]]****:** Shield floats near subject to offer protection.

**[[Shifter Prowess (Spell)|Shifter Prowess]]****:** Shifter racial bonuses to skills increase by +8.

**[[Shifting Paths (Spell)|Shifting Paths]]****:** Illusion hides path, creates false new path.

**[[Shifting Sanctum (Spell)|Shifting Sanctum]]****:** Transfer a portion of one location to another location.

**[[Shifting Sand (Spell)|Shifting Sand]]****:** Creates difficult terrain and erases tracks; can carry creatures or objects along.

**[[Shillelagh (Spell)|Shillelagh]]****:** Cudgel or quarterstaff becomes +1 weapon (2d6 damage) for 1 minute/level.

**[[Shining Cord (Spell)|Shining Cord]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Immaterial cord connects you and foe, and deals 1d6 force damage/2 levels to first person to move more than 30 feet away.

**[[Shipgate (Spell)|Shipgate]]****:** Teleports a vehicle and its contents a short distance.

**[[Shivering Touch (Spell)|Shivering Touch]]****:** Touch deals 3d6 Dex damage.

**[[Shivering Touch, Lesser (Spell)|Shivering Touch, Lesser]]****:** Touch deals 1d6 Dex damage.

**[[Shock and Awe (Spell)|Shock and Awe]]****:** [[Flat-Footed|Flat-footed]] creatures get –10 on initiative.

**Shock Shield:** A shield of force protects you until you dismiss it in an explosion of electricity.

**[[Shocking Grasp (Spell)|Shocking Grasp]]****:** Touch delivers 1d6/level electricity damage (max 5d6).

**Shocking Image:** As *[[Mirror Image (Spell)|mirror image]]*, but the duplicates emit electrical damage when destroyed.

**[[Shocking Spark (Spell)|Shocking Spark]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 4d6 points of electricity damage.

**[[Shout (Spell)|Shout]]** **<sup>Y</sup>:** Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.

**[[Shout, Greater (Spell)|Shout, Greater]]****:** Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures.

**[[Shrapnel Globe (Spell)|Shrapnel Globe]]****:** Creates sphere that explodes, inflicting 1d6 points of damage/two levels.

**[[Shrieking Blast (Spell)|Shrieking Blast]]****:** 40-ft. radius burst deafens and deals 8d6 sonic damage.

**[[Shrink Item (Spell)|Shrink Item]]****:** Object shrinks to one-sixteenth size.

**Summon Meladaemon:** Summon a [[Daemon, Meladaemon (Bestiary 2 PF1)|meladaemon]].

**[[Summon Merchant II (Spell)|Summon Merchant II]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** As *[[Summon Merchant I (Spell)|summon merchant I]]*, but the merchant has more goods and money available for trade.

**[[Summon Swarm (Spell)|Summon Swarm]]****:** Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

**[[Summon Warforged Champion (Spell)|Summon Warforged Champion]]****:** Summons a mighty warforged titan.

**[[Summon Weapon (Spell)|Summon Weapon]]****:** Create normal, nonmagical light weapon.

**Summoner Conduit:** The target takes damage whenever its summoned creature does.

**[[Summoning Wind (Spell)|Summoning Wind]]****:** Send a short message to 10 creatures/level.

**[[Sun Bolt (Spell)|Sun Bolt]]****:** Ray deals 2d6 damage, more against undead, and might blind target.

**Sun Metal:** Weapon touched bursts into flames.

**[[Sun Scepter (Spell)|Sun Scepter]]****:** Scepter of light functions as a melee weapon with the *[[Axiomatic (MagWpnSpcAb)|axiomatic]]*, *[[Disruption (MagWpnSpcAb)|disruption]]*, and *[[Flaming Burst (MagWpnSpcAb)|flaming burst]]* special abilities.

**[[Sunbeam (Spell)|Sunbeam]]****:** Beam blinds and deals 4d6 damage.

**[[Sunburst (Spell)|Sunburst]]****:** Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.

**[[Sunder Breaker (Spell)|Sunder Breaker]]****:** The next weapon that sunders an item belonging to the target takes damage.

**[[Sundering Shards (Spell)|Sundering Shards]]****:** Sundered item explodes, dealing 1d6 damage to adjacent creatures.

**[[Sunfire Tomb (Spell)|Sunfire Tomb]]****:** Imprisons target in the sun.

**[[Sunmantle (Spell)|Sunmantle]]****:** Illuminates as a *[[Daylight (Spell)|daylight]]* spell; target gains damage reduction 5/–; lashes foe for 5 points of damage 

     each time target takes damage in melee.

**[[Sunstroke (Spell)|Sunstroke]]****:** Target takes 2d6 nonlethal damage and is [[Fatigued|fatigued]].

**Sun's Disdain, Mass:** As *sun's disdain*, but targeting multiple creatures

**[[Suppress Breath Weapon (Spell)|Suppress Breath Weapon]]****:** Subject can’t use its breath weapon.

**[[Suppress Dragonmark (Spell)|Suppress Dragonmark]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Suppress the spell-like abilities of target’s dragonmark.

**[[Suppress Flame (Spell)|Suppress Flame]]** **<sup>C</sup>:** Reduces damage and illumination from fire.

**[[Suppress Glyph (Spell)|Suppress Glyph]]****:** You notice but do not trigger magical writing traps.

**[[Suppress Legacy (Spell)|Suppress Legacy]]****:** Target temporarily loses all legacy abilities of one item.

**[[Suppress Lesser (Spell)|Suppress Lesser]]****:** Lower-level arcane caster cannot cast spells.

**[[Suppress Magic (Spell)|Suppress Magic]]** **<sup>E</sup>:** Magic item or soulmeld is suppressed for 1 round/level.

**[[Suppress Primal Magic (Spell)|Suppress Primal Magic]]:** Suppress the effects of primal magic.

**[[Suppress Requirement (Spell)|Suppress Requirement]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Item that requires class feature, race, ability score, 

     or alignment to function to its fullest potential no longer carries that requirement.

**[[Suppressing Field (Spell)|Suppressing Field]]****:** Spells of a designated school or subtype are suppressed.

**Suppressing Stone <sup>FR</sup>:** Infuse arcane power into an ioun stone to protect you from mental attacks.

**Sure Casting:** Treat your CL as 5 higher for the purposes of bypassing SR with the next spell you cast.

**[[Sure Strike (Spell)|Sure Strike]]****:** Gain +1 bonus/3 levels on next attack.

**Surface Excursion:** Temporarily teleport yourself and others to the surface

**[[Surefoot (Spell)|Surefoot]]****:** +10 bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (v3.5 Balance, Jump, and Tumble) and [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]] checks.

**[[Surefooted Stride (Spell)|Surefooted Stride]]****:** You can move over rubble as easily as you can over open ground.

**[[Surefooted Stride, Mass (Spell)|Surefooted Stride, Mass]]****:** As *[[Surefooted Stride (Spell)|surefooted stride]]* but multiple subjects.

**[[Surge of Fortune (Spell)|Surge of Fortune]]****:** Gain a +2 luck bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls, saving throws, skill checks, ability checks, AC, 

     and spell penetration checks; take an automatic natural 20 on one of these rolls.

**Surmount Affliction:** Temporarily suppress one condition.

**[[Suspend Disease (Spell)|Suspend Disease]]****:** Keeps disease from harming creature for 24 hours.

**Suspend Drowning:** Targets temporarily stop drowning.

**[[Suspended Silence (Spell)|Suspended Silence]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Object becomes programmed to create an area of silence at your command.

**[[Suspension (Spell)|Suspension]]****:** Touched object floats in the air at your direction, remaining in place for days.

**[[Sustain (Spell)|Sustain]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Recipients need no food or drink for 6 hours/level.

**Sustaining Legend:** Amplify the mythic powers of the target creatures, bolstering them with healing energy.

**Swallow Your Fear <sup>R</sup>:** Increase creatures' combat effectiveness when they under a fear effect.

**[[Swamp Lung (Spell)|Swamp Lung]]****:** Water in lungs makes subject helpless, diseased.

**[[Swamp Stride (Spell)|Swamp Stride]]****:** As *[[Tree Stride (Spell)|tree stride]]*, but with bodies of water.

**[[Swarm Skin (Spell)|Swarm Skin]]****:** Turns your body into a swarm that can attack.

**[[Swift Ready (Spell)|Swift Ready]]****:** Enchant armor and weapons so that they appear on you instantly when you wish.

**[[Swim (Spell)|Swim]]****:** Subject gains swim speed, +8 bonus on [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] checks.

**[[Swim, Mass (Spell)|Swim, Mass]]****:** As *[[Swim (Spell)|swim]]*, but one creature/level.

**[[Sword of Conscience (Spell)|Sword of Conscience]]****:** Evil creature confesses crimes, takes Wisdom damage.

**[[Sword of Darkness (Spell)|Sword of Darkness]]****:** Blade of negative energy bestows one or more negative levels.

**[[Sword of Deception (Spell)|Sword of Deception]]****:** Blade of energy attacks independently, deals 1d4 damage, penalizes subsequent save.

**Sword to Snake:** Change an object into a venemous creature.

**[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|Symbol of Death]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune kills nearby creatures.

**Symbol of Debauchery <sup>M</sup>:** Conjure a symbol that makes all who see it lust for each other.

**[[Symbol of Dispelling (Spell)|Symbol of Dispelling]]** **<sup>M</sup>**: As *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, except that all creatures within 40 feet are instead affected as if by the area dispel function 

     of *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]*.

**Symbol of Distraction <sup>M</sup>:** Fascinates all creatures within 60 ft.

**[[Symbol of Fear (Spell)|Symbol of Fear]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune panics nearby creatures.

**[[Symbol of Insanity (Spell)|Symbol of Insanity]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune renders nearby creatures insane.

**[[Symbol of Laughter (Spell)|Symbol of Laughter]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune makes nearby creatures lose actions for 1 round/level.

**[[Symbol of Pain (Spell)|Symbol of Pain]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune wracks nearby creatures with pain.

**[[Symbol of Persuasion (Spell)|Symbol of Persuasion]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune charms nearby creatures.

**[[Symbol of Revelation (Spell)|Symbol of Revelation]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered symbol reveals illusions.

**[[Symbol of Scrying (Spell)|Symbol of Scrying]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune activates scrying sensor.

**[[Symbol of Sealing (Spell)|Symbol of Sealing]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Creates triggered wall of force.

**[[Symbol of Sleep (Spell)|Symbol of Sleep]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune puts nearby creatures into catatonic slumber.

**Symbol of Slowing <sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune slows creatures.

**[[Symbol of Spell Loss (Spell)|Symbol of Spell Loss]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune absorbs spells yet to be cast.

**Symbol of Storms <sup>M</sup>:** Symbol creates stormwinds and lightning when triggered

**Symbol of Strife <sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune makes creatures attack.

**Symbol of Striking <sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, but fills a 5-foot square.

**[[Symbol of Stunning (Spell)|Symbol of Stunning]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune stuns nearby creatures.

**[[Symbol of Thirst (Spell)|Symbol of Thirst]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune overwhelms nearby creatures with thirst.

**Symbol of Vulnerability <sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune gives penalties.

**[[Symbol of Weakness (Spell)|Symbol of Weakness]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune weakens nearby creatures.

**[[Sympathetic Vibration (Spell)|Sympathetic Vibration]]****:** Deals 2d10 damage/round to freestanding structure.

**[[Sympathy (Spell)|Sympathy]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Object or location attracts certain creatures.

**[[Symphonic Nightmare (Spell)|Symphonic Nightmare]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Discordant noise haunts subject’s sleep.

**[[Synostodweomer (Spell)|Synostodweomer]]****:** Channel a spell into positive energy to cure 1d8/spell level.
